Summary: Industrial heat pumps can deliver outstanding results — and optimizing their performance doesn’t have to be complicated. Just a few key guiding principles can unlock significant efficiency gains and cost savings.

Title: Lithuanian National Roundtable
Summary: The Lithuanian National Roundtable event took place online on 17 September 2025 with the participation of over 90 participants. This event was part of a series of regional and national roundtables organised under the RHC-ETIP Platform. The aim of these events was to bring together regional and national stakeholders, along with sector experts (e.g. geothermal, DHC, biomass, heat pumps, solar thermal), to discuss their vision of achieving 100% renewable heating and cooling in their respective regions and countries.

Title: Nominations for the 2025 J&E Hall Gold Medal are now open
Summary: The Institute of Refrigeration is now inviting nominations for the J&E Hall Gold Medal, one of the most internationally respected accolades in the refrigeration, air conditioning and heat pump (RACHP) industry. The winner will receive a £5,000 prize in recognition of their achievements.

Title: Lennox Declares Quarterly Dividend
Summary: , Sept. 19, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- The Lennox (NYSE: LII) board of directors approved a quarterly cash dividend of $1.30 per share of common stock, payable October 15, 2025, to stockholders of record as of September 30, 2025.
